name: Royal Treatment
description:
Cure what ails the king using your finest potions and tinctures!  Submission for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam. The theme was "Roll of the Dice". Working around the theme of luck, as you attempt to cure the king's medical problems and ailments, your treatments have a percentage chance of curing the current ailment but also a percentage chance of CAUSING another ailment.  See flow chart in the images tab (or IMGUR link) for what the different potions do. 

Controls: (https://imgur.com/a/b0oIIKm)

- ESC / P hotkey -> Quits out of the game 

- Drag the mouse around to control the hand. Left click to pick up items. 

- Left click again to drop items into the mixing pot.

- Hit enter to mix ingredients

Flow Chart: See imgur link or images on this page for the medical flow chart of what the different potions cure or what new conditions they create 

Imgur for flow chart: https://imgur.com/a/79WBOeU
